fullplot: A British couple return to Paris many years after their honeymoon there in an attempt to rejuvenate their marriage.
plot: A British couple return to Paris many years after their honeymoon there in an attempt to rejuvenate their marriage.
title: Le Week-End

tomatoes.consensus: Topped with bittersweet humor but possessing surprisingly thorny depths, Le Week-End offers a sophisticated, well-acted portrait of late-life struggles and long-term marriage.
